title: Is It Wrong To Snitch On Your Cheating Best Friend?
description:
Her friend was aware that she had been cheating on her boyfriend and decided to spill the beans! Now she's pissed because she thinks her friend had no right to snitch on her. Who's the a*hole in this situation? We debate.
